name: Valentine Chronicles: Infection
summary: While Carlos keeps watch on the street, Jill enters an underground Umbrella morgue on a mission. Collecting DNA samples from infected patients will lead to finding Patient Zero, and eventually a cure for the T-Virus. Jill is taken by surprise to find she’s not alone in the morgue and wakes up in a top secret cloning facility where she realises she’s about to recieve more DNA than she first thought possible. Will she save the world or will she be the one who needs saving?
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2020-12-17
